name: neAdventure
description:
Northeast Adventure Game is a single player text-based adventure game.

The objective of the game is to navigate through a dungeon that resides underneath of the Northeast State Community College, Blountville campus seeking a mythical object. You were informed of this mythical object by a sage,
that goes by the name of Blair the Wise. He told you the power of this object was unfathomable, and could guide you to many fortunes. Now it's up to you to find the unnamed object!
